entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
